alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:50PM CST until March 05 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Spring River At Hardy affecting Sharp and Fulton Counties. Spring River At Imboden affecting Randolph and Lawrence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River At Hardy. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water is breaking out of the banks and flooding low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight Saturday and continue falling to 4.8 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 6 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Spring River Hardy 10.0 10.5 Fri 7 PM 7.2 5.7 5.1 Falling &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
